snippet: The Yemeni government issued a public apology to southern separatists and northern Shiite Muslim rebels for wars waged against them under the former president, Ali Abdullah Saleh.
abstract: Yemeni government issues public apology to southern separatists and northern Shiite Muslim rebels for wars waged against them under former president Ali Abdullah Saleh.
lead_paragraph: The Yemeni government issued a public apology to southern separatists and northern Shiite Muslim rebels for wars waged against them under the former president, Ali Abdullah Saleh.

headline.main: Yemen: Government Issues Public Apology for Wars
headline.print_headline: Yemen: Government Issues Public Apology for Wars
